# insightchat Development Guidelines

Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2026-01-26

## Active Technologies

- Python 3.11+ (Flask backend), JavaScript ES6+ (frontend) + Flask 3.0+, existing markdown renderer in chat.html, syntax highlighting library (Prism.js or Highlight.js via CDN) (001-jupyter-notebook-support)

## Project Structure

```text
src/
tests/
```

## Commands

cd src [ONLY COMMANDS FOR ACTIVE TECHNOLOGIES][ONLY COMMANDS FOR ACTIVE TECHNOLOGIES] pytest [ONLY COMMANDS FOR ACTIVE TECHNOLOGIES][ONLY COMMANDS FOR ACTIVE TECHNOLOGIES] ruff check .

## Code Style

Python 3.11+ (Flask backend), JavaScript ES6+ (frontend): Follow standard conventions
